pool"}},"withdrawalFullService(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_pid":"index of pool to deposit into","_trancheId":"index of tranche","_wantAmt":"value in Want tokens to withdraw (0 will result returned"}}},"version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"claimAndDeposit(uint256,address,uint256,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Claim Want token and deposit (usually called after async settlement params._weeksCommitted: how many weeks the user is committing to on this vault

claimToken(uint256,uint256,address).details: Can be used to claim any token and will clear out claim in storage once successful

params._pid: index of pool to deposit into
params._token: the address of the token to be claimed

params._wantAmt: how much Want token to deposit
params._weeksCommitted: how many weeks the user is committing to on this vault

params._pid: index of pool to deposit into
params._sourceTokens: list of tokens to autoswap from
params._valueUSDC: value in USDC (in ether units) to deposit
params._weeksCommitted: how many weeks to commit to the Pool (can be 0 or any uint)

returns._0: Number of Zorro tokens per block

inCaseTokensGetStuck(address,uint256).details: Does not permit usage for the Zorro token

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._wantAmt: how much Want token to withdraw. If 0 is specified, function will only harvest Zorro rewards and not actually withdraw

params._pid: index of pool to deposit into
params._wantAmt: value in Want tokens to withdraw (0 will result in harvest and uint256(-1) will result in max value)

claimAndDeposit(uint256,address,uint256,.notice: Claim Want token and deposit (usually called after async settlement has occurred)

claimAndTransfer(uint256,address,uint256.notice: Claim Intermediary token and transfer to new Vault (usually called after async settlement has occurred)

claimAndWithdraw(uint256,address,uint256.notice: Claim Intermediary token and withdraw (usually called after async settlement has occurred)

claimToken(uint256,uint256,address).notice: Claims a token for async operations (e.g. Tranchess)

deposit(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Deposit Want tokens to associated Vault

depositFullService(uint256,uint256,addre.notice: Deposits funds in a full service manner (performs autoswaps and obtains Want tokens)

getZorroPerBlock().notice: Determine the number of Zorro to emit per block based on current market parameters

inCaseTokensGetStuck(address,uint256).notice: For owner to recover ERC20 tokens on this contract if stuck

poolLength().notice: Number of pools in the Zorro protocol

trancheLength(uint256,address).notice: Number of tranches invested by a given user into a given pool

transferInvestment(uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: Transfer all assets from a tranche in one vault to a new vault

updatePool(uint256).notice: Update reward variables of the given pool to be up-to-date.

withdraw(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Withdraw Want tokens from underlying Vault.

withdrawAll(uint256).notice: Withdraw the maximum number of Want tokens from a pool

withdrawalFullService(uint256,uint256,ui.notice: Withdraws funds from a pool and converts the Want token into USDC
